page.title: 07FASHIONS
page.content: Dresses and skirts ------------------- Short or long sleeve dresses, length of dress or skirt. Loose dress? Belt around skirt! Shirts ------- Blouse, rollneck, pullover.Long sleeve and short sleeve. Loose or with belt! Sweaters --------- Roll-neck (loose or tight) long sweaters in fashion! Hair styles ------------ People have different hair styles; some have long straight hair, others have curly hair short or long. Dyeing hair is one of the top fashions and it is not at all unusual to see a peculiar hairstyle in your own home town!
